de.greenrobot.dao.internal

Class SqlUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.greenrobot.dao.internal.SqlUtils

  • public class SqlUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to create SQL statements as used by greenDAO internally.
